data.title: La Plage de Le Zahir, Nosy Be (updated prices 2024)
data.meta_description: Situated in Nosy Be, 500 metres from Madirokely Beach, La Plage de Le Zahir features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and...
data.text:
Situated in Nosy Be, 500 metres from Madirokely Beach, La Plage de Le Zahir features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides room service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk. The rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms also feature a kitchen equipped with a stovetop. All rooms have a safety deposit box. An à la carte, continental or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Ambatoloaka Beach is 500 metres from La Plage de Le Zahir, while Ambondrona Beach is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Fascene Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.
